mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NM, LOGIN_ID FROM T_EMP_M WHERE USE_YN='Y' AND EMP_NO NOT IN (14,33,34) order by emp_no
SELECT DEPT_NO, TEAMNM FROM T_DEPT_M WHERE USE_YN ='Y' AND DEPT_NO IN (8,9,12,13,14,15) ORDER BY SORT_ORD
SELECT BRAND_ID, BRAND_NM, ORCO_BRAND_YN, SORT_ORD, USE_YN FROM T_BRAND_M WHERE USE_YN ='Y' ORDER BY BRAND_NM
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_STAT_TMP_06 SELECT CASE WHEN BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '총계' ELSE BRAND_ID END BRAND_ID , CASE WHEN BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE MAX(BRAND_NM) END BRAND_NM , CASE WHEN SUB_BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '소계' ELSE SUB_BRAND_ID END SUB_BRAND_ID , CASE WHEN SUB_BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE MAX(SUB_BRAND_NM) END SUB_BRAND_NM , CASE WHEN SUB_CAPACITY IS NULL THEN '' ELSE MAX(SUB_CAPACITY) END SUB_CAPACITY , EMP_NO , IFNULL(SUM(PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT),0) SUM_01 /* 계획 수량 */ , IFNULL(SUM(REAL_DELIVERY_CNT),0) SUM_02 /* 실제 출고 수량 */ , CASE WHEN BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN 99 WHEN SUB_BRAND_ID IS NULL AND TRIM(EMP_NO) IS NULL THEN 3 WHEN EMP_NO IS NULL THEN 2 ELSE 1 END SORT_SEQ FROM ( SELECT B.PROD_NO, B.BRAND_ID, B.SUB_BRAND_ID, A.DELIVERY_MON, A.PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT, A.REAL_DELIVERY_CNT ,(SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = B.PROD_ML_CD) SUB_CAPACITY ,C.SUB_BRAND_NM, D.BRAND_NM, I.EMP_NO, I.EMP_NM FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_MON_D A INNER JOIN T_PROD_M B ON ( A.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM = B.PROD_NO ) INNER JOIN T_SUB_BRAND_M C ON ( C.SUB_BRAND_ID = B.SUB_BRAND_ID AND C.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID ) INNER JOIN T_BRAND_M D ON ( D.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID ) INNER JOIN T_PROPOSAL_M F ON ( A.PRPS_ID = F.PRPS_ID ) INNER JOIN T_EMP_M I ON ( F.EMP_NO = I.EMP_NO ) WHERE A.DELIVERY_MON = #{staDt} /* 통계 기준 월 */ AND A.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD = '01' /* TB 제품 */ ) AA GROUP BY BRAND_ID,SUB_BRAND_ID,EMP_NO WITH ROLLUP
mapper.select: SELECT BRAND_ID,BRAND_NM, SUB_BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_NM, CONCAT(BRAND_NM,'-',SUB_BRAND_NM,'-',SUB_CAPACITY) AS BRAND_T_NM /* 사원별 수량 부분은 JAVA에서 DYNAMIN SQL로 생성해서 연결해줘야 함 SELECT * FROM T_EMP_M WHERE EMP_NO NOT IN (14) -- 시스템 관리자 제외 AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY EMP_NO 결과만큰 LOOP를 돌면서 아래 CASE WHEN 문 생성해서 전체 SQL을 가변적으로 만들어 준 후 실행 필요 */ /* LOOP START */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=35 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "alex.lee" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=36 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "sabrina.ryu" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=37 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "ws.shim" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=38 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "jw.jang" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=39 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "herry.lee" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=40 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "brian.park" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=41 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "bk.hwang" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=42 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "jh.yoon" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=43 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "s.han" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=44 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "sw.seo" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=45 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "jw.seo" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=46 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "js.bae" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=47 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "hy.shin" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=48 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "sunny.lim" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=49 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "emma.choi" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=50 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "kyungeun.jun" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=51 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "hj.ryu" ,SUM(CASE WHEN EMP_NO=53 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "jp.lee" /* LOOP END */ , SUM(ACT_SUM) "합계" FROM T_STAT_TMP_06 WHERE SORT_SEQ = 1 GROUP BY BRAND_ID,BRAND_NM, SUB_BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_NM ORDER BY BRAND_T_NM
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_STAT_TMP_01 SELECT CASE WHEN BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '총계' ELSE BRAND_ID END BRAND_ID , CASE WHEN BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE MAX(BRAND_NM) END BRAND_NM , CASE WHEN SUB_BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '소계' ELSE SUB_BRAND_ID END SUB_BRAND_ID , CASE WHEN SUB_BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE MAX(SUB_BRAND_NM) END SUB_BRAND_NM , CASE WHEN SUB_CAPACITY IS NULL THEN '' ELSE MAX(SUB_CAPACITY) END SUB_CAPACITY , DEPT_NO , IFNULL(SUM(PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT),0) SUM_01 /* 계획 수량 */ , IFNULL(SUM(REAL_DELIVERY_CNT),0) SUM_02 /* 실제 출고 수량 */ , CASE WHEN BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN 99 WHEN SUB_BRAND_ID IS NULL AND TRIM(DEPT_NO) IS NULL THEN 3 WHEN DEPT_NO IS NULL THEN 2 ELSE 1 END SORT_SEQ FROM ( SELECT B.PROD_NO, B.BRAND_ID, B.SUB_BRAND_ID, A.DELIVERY_MON, A.PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT, A.REAL_DELIVERY_CNT ,(SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = B.PROD_ML_CD) SUB_CAPACITY ,C.SUB_BRAND_NM, D.BRAND_NM, F.DEPT_NO, H.TEAMNM FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_MON_D A INNER JOIN T_PROD_M B ON ( A.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM = B.PROD_NO ) INNER JOIN T_SUB_BRAND_M C ON ( C.SUB_BRAND_ID = B.SUB_BRAND_ID AND C.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID ) INNER JOIN T_BRAND_M D ON ( D.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID ) INNER JOIN T_PROPOSAL_M F ON ( A.PRPS_ID = F.PRPS_ID ) INNER JOIN T_DEPT_M H ON ( F.DEPT_NO = H.DEPT_NO ) WHERE A.DELIVERY_MON = #{staDt} /* 통계 기준 월 */ AND A.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD = '01' /* TB 제품 */ ) AA GROUP BY BRAND_ID,SUB_BRAND_ID,DEPT_NO WITH ROLLUP
mapper.select: SELECT BRAND_ID,BRAND_NM, SUB_BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_NM, CONCAT(BRAND_NM,'-',SUB_BRAND_NM,'-',SUB_CAPACITY) AS BRAND_T_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN DEPT_NO = 8 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "Whole_Sales" , SUM(CASE WHEN DEPT_NO = 9 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "Mot_1" , SUM(CASE WHEN DEPT_NO = 12 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "Mot_2" , SUM(CASE WHEN DEPT_NO = 13 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "OFF" , SUM(CASE WHEN DEPT_NO = 14 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "Local_1_Busan" , SUM(CASE WHEN DEPT_NO = 15 THEN ACT_SUM ELSE 0 END) "Local_2_Deagu" , SUM(ACT_SUM) "합계" FROM T_STAT_TMP_01 WHERE SORT_SEQ = 1 GROUP BY BRAND_ID,BRAND_NM, SUB_BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_NM ORDER BY BRAND_T_NM
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_STAT_TMP_02 SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NM, BRAND_ID, COUNT(VENDOR_NO) VENDOR_CNT, CASE WHEN EMP_NO IS NULL THEN 99 WHEN BRAND_ID IS NULL THEN 2 ELSE 1 END SORT_SEQ FROM ( SELECT C.EMP_NO, (SELECT EMP_NM FROM T_EMP_M TE WHERE TE.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO) AS EMP_NM, D.BRAND_ID, C.VENDOR_NO FROM T_VENDOR_BRAND_D D, ( SELECT A.VENDOR_NO, B.EMP_NO FROM T_VENDOR_M A, T_VENDOR_EMP_D B WHERE A.VENDOR_NO = B.VENDOR_NO AND B.EFF_END_DT='99991231' ) C WHERE D.VENDOR_NO =C.VENDOR_NO AND D.DATA_REG_DTM LIKE CONCAT(#{staDt},'%') ) GG GROUP BY EMP_NO, EMP_NM, BRAND_ID
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO,EMP_NM /* 브랜드 고정 리스트 - 브랜드 변경시 변경 필요 */ /* LOOP START */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=9 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "American_Honey" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=11 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Aperol" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=7 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Appleton" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=16 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Averna" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=24 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "BB_R" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=17 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Beluga" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=5 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Bulldog" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=1 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Campari" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=14 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Cinzano" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=15 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Cynar" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=4 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Espolon" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=13 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "FRANGELICO" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=6 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Glengrant" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=12 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Grand_Marnier" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=21 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Guojiao" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=22 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "No_3" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=20 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "OMAR" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=19 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Patron" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=10 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Russells" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=2 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "SKYY" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=3 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "SKYY_Infusions" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=23 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "The_Kings_Ginger" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=8 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "Wild_Turkey" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=18 AND B.BRAND_ID IS NOT NULL THEN VENDOR_CNT ELSE 0 END) "X_rated" /* LOOP END */ , SUM(VENDOR_CNT) "합계" FROM T_STAT_TMP_02 A LEFT OUTER JOIN /* 체크한 브랜드를 모아놓은 테이블 BRAND_ID 별로 UNIQUE하게 생성되어야 함 */ ( SELECT DISTINCT BRAND_ID FROM T_VENDOR_BRAND_D ) B ON ( A.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID ) WHERE SORT_SEQ = 1 GROUP BY A.EMP_NO,A.EMP_NM
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_STAT_TMP_04 SELECT A.BRAND_ID, D.BRAND_NM /* 브랜드정보 */ , A.VENDOR_NO, F.VENDOR_NM /* 거래처정보 */ , H.EMP_NO, I.EMP_NM /* 담당사원 정보 */ , G.DEPT_NO, G.TEAMNM /* 부서정보 */ , DATE_FORMAT(A.DATA_REG_DTM,'%Y%m') /* 등록월 */ FROM T_VENDOR_BRAND_D A INNER JOIN T_VENDOR_M F ON ( A.VENDOR_NO = F.VENDOR_NO AND F.VENDOR_STAT_CD IN ('02','03','04') /* 거래처상태 승인완료/기획/행사중 인 거래처만 */ ) INNER JOIN T_BRAND_M D ON ( A.BRAND_ID = D.BRAND_ID ) INNER JOIN T_VENDOR_EMP_D H ON ( A.VENDOR_NO = H.VENDOR_NO AND H.EFF_END_DT = '99991231' /* 현재 유효한 */ AND H.MNGR_DIVS_CD = '0001' /* 정관리자 만 부관리자도 포함할 경우 해당 조건을 삭제처리해야 함*/ ) INNER JOIN T_EMP_M I ON ( H.EMP_NO = I.EMP_NO ) INNER JOIN T_DEPT_EMP_REL_D E ON ( H.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO AND E.EMP_DEPT_REL_GBN_CD = '0001' AND E.EFF_END_DT = '99991231' ) INNER JOIN T_DEPT_M G ON ( E.DEPT_NO = G.DEPT_NO )
mapper.select: SELECT DEPT_NO,DEPT_NM, EMP_NO, EMP_NM, VENDOR_NO,VENDOR_NM /* 브랜드 고정 리스트 - 브랜드 변경시 변경 필요 */ /* LOOP START */ ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "American_Honey" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Aperol" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Appleton" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=16 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Averna" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=24 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "BB_R" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=17 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Beluga" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Bulldog" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Campari" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=14 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Cinzano" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Cynar" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Espolon" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=13 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "FRANGELICO" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Glengrant" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Grand_Marnier" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=21 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Guojiao" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=22 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "No_3" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=20 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "OMAR" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=19 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Patron" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Russells" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "SKYY" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "SKYY_Infusions" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=23 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "The_Kings_Ginger" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "Wild_Turkey" ,SUM(CASE WHEN A.BRAND_ID=18 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "X_rated" /* LOOP END */ , COUNT(BRAND_ID) FROM T_STAT_TMP_04 A WHERE A.DATA_REG_DT = #{staDt} /* 월별 조회 */ GROUP BY DEPT_NO,DEPT_NM, EMP_NO, EMP_NM, VENDOR_NO,VENDOR_NM ORDER BY DEPT_NM,EMP_NM,VENDOR_NM
